titles.title: To restrict the enforcement of the immigration laws at polling places, and for other purposes.
Polling Access Safety Act of 2019
Polling Access Safety Act of 2019
Polling Access Safety Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Homeland Security, and House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
